loginWithCredential: User logged in successfully with credentials.
loginWithSocialGoogle: User logged in successfully with Google social login.
loginWithSocialApple: User logged in successfully with Apple social login.

error.socialApple: There was an error with Apple social login.
error.socialGoogle: There was an error with Google social login.
error.passwordAttemptMax: Too many login attempts. Please wait and try again later.
error.credentialError: Unable to login. Please check your credentials.
error.passwordMustNew: New password must be different from previous passwords within {period}.
